text: Feeling helpless this summer  again When I quit my retail job for a better paying job in a small business clinic  I thought my life was getting better Until I started working at the clinic and had a manager that gave me shit all the time to the point where it made my depression and anxiety worse  She would essentially tell me that I was useless and worthless and it didn t take too long for me to feel that way  I ended up quitting after   miserable weeks  and without finding another job first   Now I m unemployed and without income  As a college student   a nursing student  My cash supply is dwindling because of food and gas expenses  and I m lying to my parents about my unemployment because I can t bare the shame of telling them that their daughter is a quitter I must have applied to more than a dozen jobs in retail since then  I m desperate  and willing to take any job  Even one that would pay less than I was getting before   which was just   an hour  But I haven t heard back from anyone  And this just makes me feel even more worthless than ever To add insult to injury  I m not doing so hot in the one summer class that I m taking thanks to a bad start in the beginning of the semester when my depression was so bad I had no motivation to do anything  I might have to retake the class   which is more money I don t have All of my financial issues are overwhelming me and I feel way too young to take all this responsibility  It s a constant burden and a headache and I just want to run away from it all somehow or some way  Suicide keeps coming back to my mind  Depression and anxiety are battles I ve been fighting since I was fourteen  I m approaching   this August  and I don t feel any older or wiser or more capable of fighting this battle I feel ashamed for complaining about this  when there are others that are going through so much worse  And I wish I was strong enough to handle my own measly problems  But I can t  And I feel even more pathetic and worthless as a result It s neverending
summary: After quitting her job in a small business clinic, she is unemployed and without income. She is a college student and a nursing student. Her cash supply is dwindling because of food and gas expenses and she is lying to her parents about her unemployment. She has applied to more than a dozen jobs in retail since then, but hasn't heard back.
cleaned: quit job small business clinic unemployed income college student nursing student cash supply dwindle food gas expense lie parent unemployment apply dozen job retail not hear

text: I planned to kill myself when my best friend went to Europe  She arrived there yesterdayMy best friend is on holiday in Europe  Several months ago I told myself this is when I would do it  Towards the end of her holiday  When she can t feel like she could have stopped me  and my boyfriend would be at work  Now she is gone I am scared  I feel so lost and unachieved  My medicine isn t helping and I feel like a lost cause  I feel like I ve tried all I can  But now the time has come and I can t even do that  I m afraid  I need help I know I do  but I ve tried so many things and nothing is good  I m not good enough to be here

text: Heres some insight War is a sick thing and what comes out of it is body counts and veterans who are extremely unwell  And I it seems the countries who wage this war just because they cannot find a better way for the situation  just see a guy with a gun who will take orders without question   Bottom line is your enemy is the same person as you are  and you both seem to be fighting in this horrific thing just because you were told too  and these gruesome things are just everywhere all around you What comes out of it is just either death or an actual affliction that could lead to even darker pits  like alcoholism or even suicide and from where im standing  the government doesnt really give a shit who they send to the killing fields so long as they win  or what happens to them in war or after it
summary: War is a sick thing and what comes out of it is either death or an actual affliction that could lead to alcoholism or suicide. The government doesn't give a shit who they send to the killing fields so long as they win.

text: Feel Good Story I just did something and I feel so happy about it  So I bought this monitor a while back  but only used it once  Later I got a different monitor  so I packed this one up  some time flies but I put the monitor up for sale  Someone  we will name him Gary  finds it and asks for it  No negotiation  no nothing  Just the regular price  So we meet up  and I give him the monitor for some Cash  Gary was a young  extremely polite man  He was also a private in the US Air Force  that s what he told me  He was so polite and respectful that it blew me away  Usually people here are super disrespectful and annoying  it s not even funny  So he took the monitor  and I took the money and I left  For some reason  I felt like I didn t do something right  Something inside me told me to give him his money back and let him keep the monitor for free  So I called him up around   minutes after I left to come back and meet up  He did  and then I proceeded to give him his money  He asked why  and I just sat there  I didn t know why  but something was just clawing at me to give it back  I just told him that the money was just a thanks for serving the country  As soon as I said that  he just turned to tears  It was beautiful  As it turns out  he had just comeback from a tour in the Middle East  and he was setting up his new apartment  He was just overcome with joy it was just  amazing to see  As I left I could still see Gary and his massive smile across his face  I felt like I had done something wonderful  yet I still didn t know what drove me to give it to him  Gary  I love you man  and to those who serve  thank you for your service P S   My grammar is gonna be garbage I just finished a   word essay I m about done with English
summary: Gary, a private in the US Air Force, bought a monitor for the regular price. He had just come back from a tour in the Middle East and was setting up his new apartment. He was overcome with joy when he received the money from the seller.
cleaned: gary private air force buy monitor regular price come tour middle east set new apartment overcome joy receive money seller

text: You don t have to go through everything aloneI just wanted to let anyone who is feeling like they might want to harm themselves know that you don t have to deal with your feelings alone  I kept my suicidal thoughts to myself all throughout highschool  I was ashamed  and afraid that I would be told that my feelings were unwarranted  that I was weak  and that others had it much worse than I did  This resulted me in very nearly going through with it  Recently  certain life events led me to once again feel suicidal  however  I finally spoke up to my parents and my friends  I also sought out professional help  and it is amazing how much easier it has been to deal with things  I just wanted to say that you don t have to be alone
summary: In high school, she kept her suicidal thoughts to herself. Recently, she spoke up to her parents and friends and sought professional help. She wants to let others know that they don't have to deal with their feelings alone.
cleaned: high school keep suicidal thought recently speak parent friend seek professional help want let know not deal feeling
